Program Information.Duration: 2 years (5 semesters plus 1 Field Experience semester)
Program Information.School: Angelo DelZotto School of Construction Management

Contact Related Information: The Angelo DelZotto School of Construction Management at George Brown College can be reached at 416-415-5000, ext. 6297 or construction_degree@georgebrown.ca. Their office is located in room E228 and their hours are 8 a.m. – 4 p.m. The Industry Liaison Office hosts open houses in autumn and spring for more information, visit Construction and Engineering Open House page. For college-wide inquiries, contact the George Brown Contact Centre at 416-415-2000 or toll-free at 1-800-265-2002.
